Class FileManip

  • java.lang.Object
    • FileManip
  • public class FileManip
extends java.lang.Object
    Laurent's fileManipulation Helper class Handles Opening, Scanners and PrintWriter with filename * fileManip() prompts user for both input and output filename * fileManip(String) prompts user for input but allows to specify output file *
